publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3239 Patricia Ferguson: Partick Thistle Celebrates 100 Years in Maryhill—That the Parliament congratulates Partick Thistle on its 100 years’ residence at Firhill Stadium, Maryhill; notes that the team’s first game at Firhill was played on 18 September 1909 when Thistle defeated Dumbarton Harp by three goals to one; remembers the club’s major triumphs in the Scottish Cup Final of 1921 against Glasgow Rangers and the Scottish League Cup Final of 1971 against Glasgow Celtic; acknowledges the esteem in which the club is held by the people of Maryhill and beyond, and wishes the Maryhill Magyars every possible success during the next 100 years. Supported by: George Foulkes*, James Kelly*, Bill Butler*

S3M-3239 Partick Thistle Celebrates 100 Years in Maryhill (lodged on 16 January 2009) Malcolm Chisholm*, Jackie Baillie*, Mary Mulligan*, David Whitton*, Charlie Gordon*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Trish Godman*
S3M-3239 Partick Thistle Celebrates 100 Years in Maryhill (lodged on 16 January 2009) John Park*, Karen Whitefield*, Jamie Hepburn*, Des McNulty*
S3M-3239 Partick Thistle Celebrates 100 Years in Maryhill (lodged on 16 January 2009) Michael Matheson*
S3M-3239 Partick Thistle Celebrates 100 Years in Maryhill (lodged on 16 January 2009) Jack McConnell*
S3M-3239 Partick Thistle Celebrates 100 Years in Maryhill (lodged on 16 January 2009) Johann Lamont*
S3M-3239 Partick Thistle Celebrates 100 Years in Maryhill (lodged on 16 January 2009) David Stewart*
